src: « Nous avons à présent des souris de 4 mois qui ne sont pas diabétiques alors qu'elles l'étaient auparavant », a-t-il ajouté.
mt: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are not diabetic when they were before," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Le Dr Ehud Ur, professeur de médecine à l'Université Dalhousie de Halifax (Nouvelle-Écosse) et président de la division clinique et scientifique de l'Association canadienne du diabète, a averti que la recherche en était encore à ses débuts.
mt: Dr Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that research was still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: À l'instar d'autres experts, il se montre sceptique quant à la possibilité de guérir le diabète, faisant remarquer que ces résultats ne sont pas applicables aux personnes qui souffrent déjà de diabète de type 1.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about the possibility of curing diabetes, noting that these results are not applicable to people who already suffer from type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Lundi, lors d'une émission de radio sur Sveriges Radio, en Suède, Sara Danius, secrétaire permanente du Comité Nobel de Littérature de l'Académie Suédoise, a annoncé publiquement que le comité, incapable de joindre directement Bob Dylan au sujet du prix Nobel de littérature 2016, avait renoncé à le contacter.
mt: On Monday, during a radio show on Sveriges Radio, in Sweden, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly that the committee, unable to directly contact Bob Dylan about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up trying.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius a déclaré : « En ce moment, nous ne faisons rien. J'ai appelé et envoyé des courriels à son plus proche collaborateur et j'ai reçu des réponses très amicales. Pour l'instant, c'est certainement suffisant. »
mt: Danius said: "Right now, we're doing nothing. I've called and emailed his closest collaborator and I've received very friendly responses. For now, that's certainly enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Auparavant, le PDG de Ring, Jamie Siminoff, a fait remarquer qu'il a lancé l'entreprise lorsque la sonnette de sa porte d'entrée n'était pas audible depuis son magasin dans son garage.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that he started the company when the doorbell on his front door was not audible from his store in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Il dit avoir conçu une sonnette de porte Wi-Fi.
mt: He says he designed a Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: M. Siminoff a déclaré que les ventes ont augmenté après son apparition en 2013 dans un épisode de Shark Tank où le panel de la série a refusé de financer la start-up.
mt: Mr. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance in 2013 on Shark Tank, where the show's panel refused to fund the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Fin 2017, Siminoff est apparu sur la chaîne de télé-achat QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring a également réglé un procès avec une entreprise de sécurité concurrente, l'ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with a competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Même si un vaccin expérimental semble jusqu'ici capable de réduire le taux de mortalité d'Ebola, aucun remède n'a encore été suffisamment efficace pour traiter l'infection existante.
mt: Even though an experimental vaccine appears so far capable of reducing the death rate of Ebola, no treatment has yet been sufficiently effective to treat existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Même si l'administration d'un cocktail d'anticorps, ZMapp, avait d'abord montré des signes prometteurs sur le terrain, des études formelles ont démontré que sa capacité à limiter les décès ne répondait pas aux attentes.
mt: While an initial field trial of a cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, had shown promising signs, formal studies have shown that its ability to limit deaths did not meet expectations.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Dans l'essai PALM, le ZMapp a servi de témoin, ce qui signifie que les scientifiques l'ont utilisé comme base de référence et lui ont comparé les trois autres traitements.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning that scientists compared it to the three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: La Fédération américaine de gymnastique soutient la lettre du Comité olympique des États-Unis et accepte la nécessité absolue de la famille olympique de promouvoir un environnement sûr pour tous nos athlètes.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) has received a letter from the United States Olympic Committee (USOC) and the United States Olympic Committee (US
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Nous sommes d'accord avec la déclaration de l'USOC (Comité olympique des États-Unis) selon laquelle les intérêts de nos athlètes et de nos clubs, ainsi que de leur sport, pourraient être mieux servis. Cela peut être fait en allant de l'avant et en procédant plutôt à des changements significatifs au sein de notre organisation, qu'à la révocation d'accréditation.
mt: We agree with the statement of the USOC (United States Olympic Committee) that the interests of our athletes and clubs, as well as their sport, could be better served by moving forward and making significant changes within our organization, rather than revoking accreditation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics soutient une enquête indépendante qui pourrait faire la lumière sur la façon dont l’abus de la proportion décrite si courageusement par les survivants de Larry Nassar a pu passer inaperçu pendant si longtemps et adopte tout changement nécessaire et approprié.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could shed light on how the abuse described so courageously by Nassar’s survivors was able to go unnoticed for so long and adopts any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics et l'USOC ont le même objectif : rendre la gymnastique, ainsi que d'autres sports, aussi sûrs que possible pour que les athlètes puissent poursuivre leurs rêves dans un environnement sûr, positif et responsabilisant.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal: to make gymnastics, and other sports, as safe as possible so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive, and responsible environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Tout au long des années 1960, Brzezinski a travaillé pour John F. Kennedy en tant que conseiller, puis pour l'administration de Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: Throughout the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as an advisor, then for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Lors des sélections de 1976, il a conseillé Carter en matière de politique étrangère, puis a été conseiller à la sécurité nationale (NSA) de 1977 à 1981, succédant à Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Pendant son temps au sein de la NSA, il a aidé Carter à résoudre diplomatiquement des questions internationales telles que les accords de Camp David, en 1978, la normalisation des relations entre les États-Unis et la Chine à la fin des années 1970, la révolution iranienne et ses conséquences comme la prise d'otages en Iran, en 1979, et l'invasion des forces soviétiques en Afghanistan, en 1979.
mt: During his time at the NSA, he helped Carter resolve international issues such as the Camp David Accords in 1978, normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution and its consequences such as the Iran hostage crisis in 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Le film, avec Ryan Gosling et Emma Stone, a reçu des nominations dans toutes les grandes catégories.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all the major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Golsling et Stone ont respectivement été nominés pour le Meilleur Acteur et la Meilleure Actrice.
mt: Golsling and Stone were respectively nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Parmi les autres nominations figurent celles du meilleur film, du meilleur réalisateur, de la meilleure cinématographie, des meilleurs costumes, du meilleur montage, de la meilleure musique originale, des meilleurs décors, du meilleur montage sonore, du meilleur mixage et du meilleur scénario original.
mt: Among the other nominations are those for best film, best director, best cinematography, best costumes, best editing, best original music score, best art direction, best sound editing, best sound mixing and best original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Deux chansons du film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) et City of Stars, ont été nominées pour la meilleure chanson originale. Le studio Lionsgate a reçu 26 nominations — plus que tout autre studio.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Tard dimanche, le président des États-Unis Donald Trump, dans une déclaration faite par l'intermédiaire du secrétaire de presse, a annoncé que les troupes américaines allaient se retirer de la Syrie.
mt: Late Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement made through the press secretary, announced that U.S. troops would be withdrawing from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: L’annonce a été faite après que M. Trump ait eu une conversation téléphonique avec le président turc Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Mr. Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: La Turquie prendrait également en charge la garde des combattants d'ISIS capturés que, selon la déclaration, les nations européennes ont refusé de rapatrier.
mt: Turkey would also take charge of guarding ISIS fighters captured that, according to the statement, European nations have refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Cela confirme non seulement qu'au moins certains dinosaures avaient des plumes, une théorie déjà très répandue, mais fournit des détails que les fossiles ne peuvent généralement pas fournir, comme la couleur et la disposition tridimensionnelle.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widely accepted, but provides details that fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Les scientifiques disent que le plumage de cet animal était brun châtain sur le dessus et de couleur pâle ou caroténoïde sur le dessous.
mt: Scientists say the bird's plumage was brown on top and pale or carotenoid on the underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Cette découverte permet également de mieux comprendre l'évolution des plumes chez les oiseaux.
mt: This discovery also helps to better understand the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Étant donné que les plumes de dinosaure n'ont pas une tige entièrement développée, que l'on appelle rachis, mais montrent cependant d'autres caractéristiques propres aux plumes – barbes et barbules – les chercheurs en ont déduit que le rachis était probablement un développement évolutif ultérieur à ces autres caractéristiques.
mt: Because dinosaur feathers lacked a fully developed shaft, called the rachis, but showed other characteristics of feathers – barbs and barbules – the researchers concluded that the rachis was probably a later evolutionary development of these other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: La structure des plumes suggère qu’elles n’étaient pas utilisées en vol mais plutôt pour la régulation ou l’affichage de la température. Les chercheurs ont suggéré que, même s’il s’agit de la queue d’un jeune dinosaure, l’échantillon montre un plumage d’adulte et non le duvet d’un poussin.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows adult plumage and not the down of a hatchling.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Les scientifiques précisent qu'il s'agit certes de la queue d'un dinosaure juvénile, mais l'échantillon révèle un plumage appartenant à un individu adulte, et non à un jeune.
mt: The scientists note that it is indeed the tail of a juvenile dinosaur, but the specimen reveals a feathering belonging to an adult, not a young one.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Une voiture piégée a explosé au siège de la police à Gaziantep, en Turquie, hier matin, tuant deux officiers de police et blessant plus de vingt autres personnes.
mt: A car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Le bureau du gouverneur a déclaré que dix-neuf des blessés étaient des officiers de police.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: La police a déclaré soupçonner un militant présumé de Daesh (ÉI) comme le suspect à l'origine de cette attaque.
mt: Police have suspected a suspected Daesh (IS) militant as the suspect behind the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ils ont constaté que le Soleil fonctionnait selon les mêmes principes de base que les autres étoiles. L'activité de toutes les étoiles du système est déterminée par leur luminosité, leur rotation et rien d'autre.
mt: They found that the Sun worked on the same basic principles as other stars. The activity of all the stars in the system is determined by their brightness, their rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: La luminosité et la rotation sont utilisées conjointement afin de déterminer le nombre de Rossby d'une étoile, qui est lié au flux de plasma.
mt: Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is linked to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: En ce qui concerne les inversions magnétiques, plus le nombre de Rossby est petit, moins l’étoile est active .
mt: As for magnetic reversals, the smaller the number of Rossby, the less active the star is.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Au cours de son voyage, Iwasaki a eu des problèmes à de nombreuses occasions.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki had problems at many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Il a été volé par des pirates, attaqué au Tibet par un chien enragé, a échappé à un mariage au Népal et a été arrêté en Inde.
mt: It was stolen by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: La norme 802.11n fonctionne à la fois sur les fréquences 2,4 GHz et 5,0 GHz.
mt: 802.11n works on both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ceci autorisera la rétro-compatibilité avec les itérations 802.11a, b et g, sous réserve que la station possède deux radios.
mt: 802.11n will allow backward compatibility with 802.11a, b and g iterations, provided the station has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Les vitesses de la norme Wi-Fi 802.11n sont sensiblement plus rapides que celles de ses prédécesseurs, avec un débit théorique maximum de 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are significantly faster than its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, qui est marié et a deux enfants adultes, n’a pas fait bonne impression à Miller, à qui l’histoire a été relatée.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a good impression on Miller, who was told the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Lorsqu'on lui a demandé de commenter, Miller a déclaré : « Mike parle beaucoup pendant l'audience… Je me préparais, donc je n'ai pas vraiment entendu ce qu'il disait ».
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was preparing, so I didn't really hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: « Nous nous efforcerons de réduire les émissions de dioxyde de carbone par unité de PIB de manière significative d'ici 2020 par rapport au niveau de 2005 », a déclaré M. Hu.
mt: "We will strive to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP significantly by 2020 compared with the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Il n'a pas chiffré ces réductions, disant qu'elles seront basées sur la production économique chinoise.
mt: He did not quantify these reductions, saying they will be based on China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu a encouragé les pays en voie de développement « à éviter l'ancienne méthode qui consistait à polluer d'abord et à nettoyer ensuite ».
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to "avoid the old method of polluting first and cleaning up later".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Il a ajouté qu’« on ne devrait cependant pas leur demander d’assumer des obligations qui dépassent leur stade de développement, leur responsabilité et leurs capacités. »
mt: He added that ‘ we should not, however, ask them to assume obligations that exceed their stage of development, their responsibility and their capabilities. ’
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Le groupe d’étude sur l’Irak a présenté son rapport aujourd’hui à 12 h GMT.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report today at 12 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Il avertit que personne ne peut garantir que toute action en Irak à ce stade mettra fin à la guerre sectaire, à la violence croissante ou au glissement vers le chaos.
mt: He warned that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this stage will end sectarian war, growing violence or a slide toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Le rapport s'ouvre par un appel à un débat ouvert et à la formation d'un consensus aux États-Unis sur la politique à l'égard du Moyen-Orient.
mt: The report opens with a call for an open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States on Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Le rapport est très critique envers presque tous les aspects de la politique actuelle du gouvernement à l'égard de l'Irak et plaide vivement pour un changement de direction immédiat.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the government's current policy towards Iraq and strongly urges an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: La première de ses 78 recommandations est qu'une nouvelle initiative diplomatique devrait être prise avant la fin de l'année pour sécuriser les frontières de l'Irak contre les interventions hostiles et afin de rétablir les relations diplomatiques avec ses voisins.
mt: 1 of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of the year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: L'actuelle sénatrice et Première Dame d'Argentine Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner a annoncé sa candidature présidentielle, hier soir, à La Plata, une ville située à 50 kilomètres (31 miles) de Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mme Kirchner a annoncé son intention de se présenter à la présidence au Théâtre argentin, le même endroit où elle a commencé sa campagne 2005 pour le Sénat en tant que membre de la délégation de la province de Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same place where she began her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Le débat a été déclenché par la controverse sur les dépenses liées aux secours et à la reconstruction à la suite de l'ouragan Katrina ; ce que certains conservateurs en matière budgétaire ont appelé avec humour « l'accord Bush pour la Nouvelle-Orléans ».
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction following Hurricane Katrina; what some budget hawks have called with humor "the Bush deal for New Orleans."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Les critiques des libéraux sur l'effort de reconstruction se sont concentrées sur l'attribution de contrats de reconstruction à des personnes perçues comme des initiés de Washington.
mt: Liberal critics of the reconstruction effort have focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to people perceived as Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Plus de 4 000 000 personnes sont se sont rendues à Rome pour l'enterrement.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: En raison du nombre important de personnes présentes, il n'a pas été possible pour tout le monde d'assister aux funérailles sur la place Saint-Pierre.
mt: Due to the large number of people present, it was not possible for everyone to attend the funeral on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Plusieurs grands écrans de télévision ont été installés à différents endroits à Rome pour permettre aux gens de regarder la cérémonie.
mt: Several large television screens were installed at different places in Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Dans de nombreuses autres villes d'Italie et dans le reste du monde, en particulier en Pologne, des installations similaires ont été réalisées et ont été vues par un grand nombre de personnes.
mt: In many other Italian cities and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar installations have been made and have been seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Les historiens ont critiqué les politiques passées du FBI pour avoir concentré les ressources sur des affaires faciles à résoudre, en particulier les affaires de voitures volées, avec l'intention d'augmenter le taux de réussite de l'agence.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies for focusing resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, with the intention of increasing the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Le Congrès a lancé le financement de l'initiative contre la pornographie au cours de l'exercice 2005, tout en précisant que le FBI s'apprêtait à affecter dix agents à la lutte contre la pornographie adulte.
mt: 2005 Congress launched the funding of the anti-pornography initiative during the exercise, while specifying that the FBI was about to assign ten agents to the fight against adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa a obtenu le score le plus élevé des manches, 70 points en seulement 41 balles en frappant 11 fois quatre runs et 2 fois six runs.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the innings, 70 runs in 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Les batteurs d'ordre moyen, Sachin Tendulkar et Rahul Dravid, ont obtenu de bons résultats et ont accompli un century ensemble.
mt: The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, have scored well and have achieved a century together.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mais après avoir perdu le guichet de son capitaine, l'Inde n'a réalisé que 36 courses et perdu sept guichets jusqu'à la fin de la manche.
mt: But after losing their captain's berth, India only managed 36 runs and lost seven wickets until the end of the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Le président américain George W. Bush est arrivé à Singapour le matin du 16 novembre, débutant une tournée d’une semaine en Asie.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Il a été accueilli par Wong Kan Seng, le vice-premier ministre de Singapour, et a discuté de commerce et de terrorisme avec Lee Hsien Loong, le Premier ministre de Singapour.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Après sept jours de défaites électorales aux élections de mi-mandat, Bush a fait part de son projet d'élargir le commerce en Asie.
mt: After seven days of electoral defeats in mid-term elections, Bush has announced his plan to expand trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Le Premier ministre Stephen Harper a accepté d'envoyer la « loi sur la qualité de l'air » du gouvernement à un comité multipartite pour examen, avant sa deuxième lecture, après la réunion de 25 minutes de mardi avec le chef du NPD, Jack Layton, au CPM.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to a multi-party committee for review, before second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the House of Commons.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton avait demandé des changements au sujet du projet de loi environnemental des conservateurs lors de la réunion avec le premier ministre, demandant une « reformulation complète et approfondie » du projet de loi environnemental du parti conservateur.
mt: Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental bill at a meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a "complete and thorough reworking" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Et depuis, le gouvernement fédéral a pris les devants en se chargeant du financement du Mersey Hospital à Devonport, en Tasmanie. Le gouvernement d'état et certains parlementaires ont qualifié cet acte de farce à l'approche des élections de novembre.
mt: And since then, the federal government has taken the lead in funding the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania. The state government and some parliamentarians have called this a farce as the November elections approach.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Mais le Premier ministre John Howard a déclaré que cette loi visait uniquement à éviter que les installations de l'hôpital ne soient déclassées par le gouvernement de Tasmanie, en donnant 45 millions de dollars australiens supplémentaires.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the law was only to prevent the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, giving it an extra 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: D'après le dernier bulletin, les relevés du niveau de la mer indiquent qu'un tsunami s'est produit. Une activité tsunami précise a été enregistrée près de Pago Pago et de Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred. A tsunami warning is in effect for American Samoa and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Aucun dommage ou blessure grave n’a été signalé à Tonga, mais l’électricité a été temporairement coupée, ce qui aurait empêché les autorités tonganes de recevoir l’alerte au tsunami émise par le centre d’alerte des tsunamis dans le Pacifique.
mt: No damage or serious injury was reported in Tonga, but electricity was temporarily cut, which would have prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami alert issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Quatorze écoles d’Hawaii situées sur ou près des côtes ont été fermées toute la journée de mercredi malgré la levée des alertes.
mt: 14 Hawaii schools located on or near the coast were closed all day Wednesday despite the cancellation of the alerts.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Le président américain George W. Bush a accueilli cette annonce avec satisfaction.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the news.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Le porte-parole de Bush, Gordon Johndroe, a qualifié la promesse de la Corée du Nord « d'étape majeure vers l'objectif de la dénucléarisation vérifiable de la péninsule coréenne ».
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean promise "a major step toward the verified denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: La tempête subtropicale Jerry, 10ème tempête de la saison des ouragans à porter un nom, est apparue ce jour dans l'océan Atlantique.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, appeared today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Le National Hurricane Center (NHC) affirme qu'à ce stade, Jerry ne représente aucune menace pour les terres.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: D’après le U.S. Corps of Engineers, une pluviométrie de 6 pouces pourrait ouvrir une brèche dans les digues précédemment endommagées.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach previously damaged levees, according to the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Le neuvième district, qui a connu des inondations atteignant 20 pieds de haut lors de l'ouragan Katrina, est actuellement sous les eaux jusqu'à la taille car la digue voisine a été débordée.
mt: 9th Ward, which experienced 20-foot-high flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is currently under water up to the waist as the nearby levee has been breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: L'eau se déverse sur la digue dans une section de 100 pieds de large.
mt: 100 feet of dike is flooded.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Lors de son discours sur Wikinews le mois dernier, Adam Cuerden, directeur de Commons, a exprimé sa frustration quant aux suppressions qui avaient été faites.
mt: In his Wikinews talk last month, Adam Cuerden, director of Commons, expressed his frustration over the deletions that had been made.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: « Il [Wales] nous a carrément menti dès le départ. Tout d'abord en prétextant des raison légales, puis en faisant semblant de nous écouter jusqu'à ce qu'il ait supprimé son œuvre. »
mt: « He [Wales] lied to us outright from the start. First by claiming legal reasons, then by pretending to listen to us until he had removed his work. »
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Le mécontentement de la communauté a entraîné les efforts actuels visant à concevoir une politique relative au contenu à caractère sexuel du site qui héberge des millions de médias libres d’accès.
mt: The community's dissatisfaction led to the current efforts to design a policy regarding the sexually explicit content of the site that hosts millions of free-access media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Le travail effectué était principalement théorique, mais le programme a été écrit pour simuler les observations faites de la galaxie du Sagittaire.
mt: The work done was mainly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: L’effet que l’équipe recherchait serait causé par les forces de marée entre la matière noire de la galaxie et la matière noire de la Voie lactée.
mt: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by the tides between the galaxy’s dark matter and the Milky Way’s dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tout comme la lune exerce une traction sur la terre, provoquant des marées, la Voie lactée exerce une force sur la galaxie du Sagittaire.
mt: Just as the moon exerts a pull on the Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Les scientifiques ont pu conclure que la matière noire affecte les autres matières noires de la même manière que la matière normale.
mt: Scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matters in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Selon cette théorie, la majeure partie de la matière noire autour d’une galaxie se trouve dans une sorte de halo, et est constituée d’un grand nombre de petites particules.
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter around a galaxy is in a sort of halo, and is made up of a large number of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Les reportages télévisés montrent de la fumée blanche provenant de l'usine.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Les autorités locales avertissent les habitants des environs de rester à l’intérieur, d’éteindre les climatiseurs et de ne pas boire l’eau du robinet.
mt: Local authorities warn residents to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Selon l'agence nucléaire japonaise, du césium et de l'iode radioactifs ont été identifiés à la centrale.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Les autorités supposent que cela signifie que les réservoirs de combustible d'uranium sur le site comporteraient des fissures et des fuites.
mt: Authorities believe this means the fuel tanks on the site have cracks and leaks.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Le Dr Tony Moll a découvert la tuberculose multirésistante (TB-MR) dans la région sud-africaine du KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered multi-drug resistant tuberculosis (TB-MR) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: "Dans une interview, il a déclaré que la nouvelle mutation était ""très troublante et alarmante en raison du taux de mortalité très élevé""."
mt: "In an interview, he said the new mutation was ""very troubling and alarming because of the very high mortality rate."""
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Certains patients auraient contracté le virus à l’hôpital, selon le Dr Moll, et au moins deux d’entre eux faisaient partie du personnel de l’hôpital.
mt: Some patients contracted the virus at the hospital, according to Dr. Moll, and at least two of them were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
